title: News24.com | International Covid-19 update | China denies cover-up, virus cases top 32 000 in Russia, Belgium death toll passes 5 000
description: China has denied Western suggestions it had covered up the extent of its coronavirus outbreak, Russia said it had recorded 32 008 coronavirus cases and the novel coronavirus claims more than 5 000 lives in Belgium.
content:
Keeping you up to date on the latest novel coronavirus (Covid-19) news from around the world.

China denies cover-up in coronavirus outbreak
